Subskills.name: Rapid Spearhandling
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using death from above.

Subskills.name: Heavy Spears
Subskills.description: Increases falling speed and damage dealt by death from above.

Subskills.name: Spear Delivery
Subskills.description: Throw multiple spears in an arc unleashing death from above on hit.

Subskills.name: Icebreaking Spearshower
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by death from above to monsters at maximum life.

Subskills.name: Spearhandler's Intellect
Subskills.description: Decreases mana cost when using death from above.

Subskills.name: Need for Speed
Subskills.description: Death from above deals additional damage based on your bonus movement speed.

Subskills.name: Safeheaven
Subskills.description: If there are no nearby enemies, death from above covers a larger area with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Storm of Spears
Subskills.description: Multiple waves of spears rain down over time in a larger area that slowly follows the closest enemy. Death from above now has a small cooldown.

Subskills.name: Critical Arrowfall
Subskills.description: Now has a chance to critically strike dealing increased damage based on your critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Stacking Life
Subskills.description: Increase your maximum life and mana on hit for a short period.

Subskills.name: Dual Spearshower
Subskills.description: Chance to fire an additional death from above.

Subskills.name: Ancient Device
Subskills.description: Summon an ancient device periodically firing death from above on nearby targets based on your cooldown recovery.

Subskills.name: Detonation Shower
Subskills.description: Chance on landing for spears to explode dealing increased damage.
